app_descript:
Brief:

Dig it! is a challenging and entertaining puzzle game that blends inventive gameplay with easy-to-understand mechanics, realistic physics, and beautifully designed levels to provide an engaging mental exercise. Emphasizing logical thinking and creativity, players dig their way through a variety of obstacles to guide balls towards their goals.
